content:
/>
III.ii.2.A.1.d
.
Definition:
Personnel Records
Personnel records
are administrative records, containing information about the service member's service history such as
date and type of enlistment/appointment
duty stations and assignments
training, qualifications, performance (awards and decorations received)
disciplinary and other personnel actions, and
date and type of separation/discharge/retirement (including
DD Form 214, Certificate of Uniformed Service
, or equivalent).
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A - General Information on Service Records
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A
